function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in the hospital building may lead to high CO2 concentrations, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and reduced indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Improvement of ventilation systems, regular maintenance, and monitoring of CO2 levels.","Technologies":"Upgraded ventilation systems, air purifiers, and CO2 sensors.","People":"Patients, hospital staff, visitors.","Owner":"Building facility managers, hospital administrators."},{"Description":"Elevated PM 2.5 concentrations in the hospital building may indicate poor indoor air quality, posing health risks to occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory problems and reduced indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Enhanced filtration systems, strict maintenance of HVAC systems, and air quality monitoring.","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, air purifiers, and PM 2.5 sensors.","People":"Patients, hospital staff, visitors.","Owner":"Hospital administrators, building facility managers."},{"Description":"Thermal discomfort in the offices may lead to reduced productivity and occupant dissatisfaction.","Impact":"Decreased productivity and occupant dissatisfaction.","Mitigation":"Window treatments for solar control, improvement of insulation, and optimization of HVAC systems.","Technologies":"Smart window films, energy-efficient insulation, and smart HVAC systems.","People":"Office workers.","Owner":"Building operators, facility managers."}]}
